Dear {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Thank you for contacting LegalZoom for your business needs. In regard to your inquiry, LegalZoom can assist you in filing the Statement of Use for your Trademark Registration. We simplify the process for you by preparing and filing the Statement of Use application with the US Patent & Trademark Office (USPTO).
For your reference, general information regarding Statement of Use filings has been outlined below. If you would like to get specific, detailed information on your personal situation, please contact an Intellectual Property Specialist at the phone number listed below. By speaking with a Specialist, we will be able to assist with answering further questions, as well as building a customized package to best benefit your needs.
The Statement of Use is required to provide proof to the USPTO that you are actively using your Trademark to sell the goods or services listed in your Trademark application. The Statement of Use is due within 6 months of the mailing date of your Notice of Allowance. If the Statement of Use filing is not submitted, the Trademark may be abandoned by the USPTO.
For your convenience, we have listed all relevant pricing below.
STATEMENT OF USE - $99.00 + $100.00 USPTO filing fee

ADDITIONAL SERVICES Additional Trademark Class - $149.00/each Change of Address - $49.00
Thank you for contacting LegalZoom with your business inquiries, and we look forward to assisting you. If you have any additional questions, please feel free to contact us by phone at the phone number listed below.
Best regards,
